faq.q1: How does Instant Bible Search work?
faq.a1: Our tool uses advanced AI technology to analyze your spoken or written input, understand its meaning, and instantly match it to relevant Bible verses from multiple translations.
faq.q2: Do I need to create an account?
faq.a2: No, Instant Bible Search is completely free and does not require any account or login. Just speak or type, and youâ€™ll get results immediately.
faq.a3: The app currently uses a combination of public domain versions and translations supported by our AI model, including the King James Version (KJV), World English Bible (WEB), and others.
faq.q4: Can I use this tool offline?
faq.a4: Not yet. Voice recognition and AI processing require an internet connection, but we are working on a future version that will support offline access and local languages.
